class.name: MathIllegalArgumentException

javadoc.text: Base class for all preconditions violation exceptions. * In most cases, this class should not be instantiated directly: it should * serve as a base class to create all the exceptions that have the semantics * of the standard {@link IllegalArgumentException}.

javadoc.param: pattern Message pattern explaining the cause of the error.
